page.title: 20CONCLUSION
page.content: This project has been useful and one which it is hoped will be of use to forthcoming generations. The exercise has given children an insight into many aspects of learning, it has broadened their use of maps and reference materials,insomuch as it deals with their area,and people. They tried in the time available to set out facts and ideas about this part of Hereford,in the footsteps of the compilers of the original Domeday Book,where Tarrington was mentioned. When you read this in the future try to picture a small group of children who have worked hard and long to put onto a disc those facts which were relevant at the time. K.Owers,L.Preece,T.Munn,W.Bishop, M&E.Basford,L.Smith,J.Lane,E.Bryan, S.Smith,J.Fortey,S&S.Cotterell,P.Cox, C.Forrest and H.Small. JULY 1985.
